title: Cleric Spells
content: aling 3d8+3Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m PLANAR BINDING Lv 5 Abjuration Action Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally. 10 Turns Target must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration SEEMING Lv 5 Illusion Action Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m TELEKINESIS Lv 5 Transmutation Action Throw
